body_html: Can confirm this has change has been introduced between 0.3.1. and 0.4 (using 2018.04.20 nightly) - using same OS, conda, Python version etc. Docs for either version just mention accepting "sequences", so the specific types expected are a bit ambiguous. On the other hand, the error here mentions tuple but accepts a list, so that's definitely overly specific.

body: Can confirm this has change has been introduced between 0.3.1. and 0.4 (using 2018.04.20 nightly) - using same OS, conda, Python version etc. Docs for either version just mention accepting "sequences", so the specific types expected are a bit ambiguous. On the other hand, the error here mentions `tuple` but accepts a `list`, so that's definitely overly specific.
